description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC, PAT_ENC_2, PAT_ENC_3, and PAT_ENC_4 tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PUBLIC_HOUSING_YN
columns.description:
This item tracks whether or not a patient lived in public housing at the time of a given encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PVT_HOSP_ENC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the private encounter setting for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LINK_INS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The lab insurance type category ID for the insurance type used with the ordering encounter in EpicCare Link.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other Patient Insurance

columns.name: PAT_VER_HCA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the patient's response on the Health Care Agent Verification screen in Welcome; either "Patient indicated data was correct" or "Patient indicated they want to discuss care decisions with a clinician."


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient indicated data was correct


Patient indicated they want to discuss care decisions with a clinician

columns.name: EXT_GRP_IDNT
columns.description: This column holds appointment group identifiers assigned by external systems. If two appointments have the same external group identifier, they were checked in as a group, and they will be treated as a group in Epic.

columns.name: EXT_GRP_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the source of an external group identifier in EXT_GRP_IDNT. If two rows have the same value for their external group source, the same external system grouped the appointments.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PREPAY_SET_BY_USER_YN
columns.description:
This item will be set to Yes if the prepay due for this visit was manually set by a user.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PUBLIC_HOUSING_YN

columns.name: PREPAY_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: User who last updated the prepay due amount.

columns.name: PREPAY_UPDATE_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant the prepay due for the visit was updated.

columns.name: PREPAY_CALC_SCENARIO
columns.description: Stores the scenario/reason why the corresponding payment needs to be collected upfront from the patient.

columns.name: AUTHCERT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the auth/cert associated with the patient contact.

columns.name: ED_REF_CALLBAK_YN
columns.description:
Whether a referring provider requests a call back from the ED physician at the end their visit


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PUBLIC_HOUSING_YN

columns.name: ED_REF_CALLBAK_P_ID
columns.description: Provider that is referring the patient to the ED

columns.name: ED_REF_CALLBAK_C_ID
columns.description: Location the provider is being referred to the ED from

columns.name: ED_REF_CALLBAK_NUM
columns.description: Phone number to contact the referring provider at after ED visit

columns.name: IS_ON_DEMAND_VV_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether this contact is an on-demand video visit.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PUBLIC_HOUSING_YN

columns.name: ATTR_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department that is associated with the encounter.

columns.name: PAT_DTREE_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: Stores the decision tree that was completed by the patient which resulted in this encounter being created.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total amount that was discounted because a patient paid early.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_PCT
columns.description: Stores the percent that was used to calculate the prepay discounted amount.

columns.name: PREPAY_PROPOSED_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: Stores what the prepay discount would be if it applied.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_CALC_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the rule that was used to determine the prepay discount percent.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_CALC_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the rule.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_CALC_PCT
columns.description: Stores the system calculated percent for a prepay discount.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_OVRIDE_AMT
columns.description: If a user overrides the prepay discount amount, the override will be stored here and we will no longer use rules to determine the prepay discount.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_OVRIDE_PCT
columns.description: If a user overrides the prepay discount percent, the override will be stored here and we will no longer use rules to determine the prepay discount.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_OVRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: If a user overrides the prepay discount, this will store the user who made the override.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_OVRIDE_CMT
columns.description: If a user overrides the prepay discount and adds a comment about why they did so, the comment will be stored here.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCNT_OVRIDE_DTTM
columns.description: If a user overrides the prepay discount, this will store the instant it was overridden. This item is mainly used for reference purposes.

columns.name: EVISIT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the e-visit encounter. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Submitted


Abandoned
